rework.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make changes in something such as music or a piece of writing
rework.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I plan to rework the whole song.
rework.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to make changes to something so that it can be used again or is more suitable for a particular use
rework.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The reworked commercial was much more successful than the original one.
rework.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to correct mistakes or faults in something
rework.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: 10% of the engines had to be reworked when they came off the production line.
rework.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: The first-half figures had been reworked.
